    • LevelParent

      protected LevelParent(String backgroundImageName, double screenHeight, double screenWidth, int playerInitialHealth)
      Constructs a new LevelParent.
      Parameters:
      backgroundImageName - the name of the background image resource.
      screenHeight - the height of the screen.
      screenWidth - the width of the screen.
      playerInitialHealth - the initial health of the player's plane.

    • endGame

      protected void endGame(boolean isWin)
      Handles the end of the game, either win or lose. Stops the game loop, plays the appropriate audio, displays the end screen image, and creates an EndMenu.
      Parameters:
      isWin - true if the user wins the game, false otherwise.

    • resetGameState

      public void resetGameState()
      Resets the game state. Called when the level or game is restarted.

      Pauses the game by stopping the game loop.

      Resumes the game by starting the game loop.

      protected void addEnemyUnit(ActiveActorDestructible enemy)
      Adds a new enemy unit to the game. The enemy is added to both the list of enemy units and the scene graph.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy unit to be added.
